post.summary: Upload Phone Planning Document in CUCM
Upload Phone Planning Document in CUCM
post.description:
* Paste phones in from excel into the text box area. This must be in the correct format to be parsed correctly.
     * See phone planning template for correct format. Do not include headers when pasting.
     *
     * phones format:
     * 'First Name'	'Last Name'	'Username'	'MAC Address'	'Device Type'	'10 digit Extension'	'Language'	'Default Password for User ID Access'	U'nity Mailbox Y/N'	'NOTES'
     *

parameters.name: extlength
parameters.description: Internal Extension Length - 4 digit is standard - Used for Internal Short Dialing

parameters.name: phones
parameters.description: Paste in data from phone planning template - Do not include header info. Follow Format above in notes.

post.summary: Create New Site in CUCM
post.description:
* Select the correct Site Design Type according to your site's specific requirements.
     * Type 1 - Centralized SIP Trunking and Centralized E911
     * Type 2 - Local Gateway Trunking but using Centralized E911
     * Type 3 - Centralized SIP Trunking but leveraging local gateway/SRST for 911
     * Type 4 - Local Gateway Trunking and 911

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Design Type - See Implementation Notes Above

parameters.name: srstip
parameters.description: SRST IP Address - Not required for Type 1 Designs. Recommended but not required for Type 2,3, and 4

parameters.name: h323ip
parameters.description: These are required for Design Type 2,3,and 4. If multiple H323 Gateways, enter each one on new line. These will get added to the site route group.

     * Type 2 - Local Gateway Trunking but using Centralized E911

parameters.description: These are required for Design Type 2,3,and 4. If multiple H323 Gateways, enter each one on new line. These will get added to the site route group.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: TimeZone and Format - These are prebuilt in CUCM and may need customized to your environment.

parameters.name: didrange
parameters.description: Last 4 digit Ranges. Use Regex to represent the DID Ranges. Use multiple Lines to represent multiple ranges. Example: 40[2-9]X

post.description:
* Select the correct Site Design Type according to your site's specific requirements.
     * Type 1 - Centralized SIP Trunking and Centralized E911
     * Type 2 - Local Gateway Trunking but using Centralized E911
     * Type 3 - Centralized SIP Trunking but leveraging local gateway/SRST for 911
     * Type 4 - Local Gateway Trunking and 911

parameters.name: srstip
parameters.description: SRST IP Address - Not required for Type 1 Designs. Recommended but not required for Type 2,3, and 4

parameters.name: h323ip
parameters.description: These are required for Design Type 2,3,and 4. If multiple H323 Gateways, enter each one on new line. These will get added to the site route group.

post.summary: Create Site Plan
post.description:
* Select the correct Site Design Type according to your site's specific requirements.
     * Type 1 - Centralized SIP Trunking and Centralized E911
     * Type 2 - Local Gateway Trunking but using Centralized E911
     * Type 3 - Centralized SIP Trunking but leveraging local gateway/SRST for 911
     * Type 4 - Local Gateway Trunking and 911

parameters.name: srstip
parameters.description: SRST IP Address - Not required for Type 1 Designs. Recommended but not required for Type 2,3, and 4

parameters.name: h323ip
parameters.description: These are required for Design Type 2,3,and 4. If multiple H323 Gateways, enter each one on new line. These will get added to the site route group.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: TimeZone and Format - These are prebuilt in CUCM and may need customized to your environment.

parameters.name: didrange
parameters.description: Last 4 digit Ranges. Use Regex to represent the DID Ranges. Use multiple Lines to represent multiple ranges. Example: 40[2-9]X

parameters.name: didblocks
parameters.description: DID Block IDs assigned to the site.

parameters.name: extlen
parameters.description: Extension Length for internal dialling. Sites with last 4 digits starting with 9 need to be 5 or 10

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Languages that are used at the site. One per line. (english, french)
